languages.text:
"Сага окончилась стаи Зловещего воя,
О, Черногрив, укажи до Кьялхаллы им путь!
Лишь одного не прибрал темнодушный Моркаи -
Ульфар Громогласный упрямо на тверди стоял.
Слишком упрям был для смерти сей Волк непокорный,
Слишком горяч, чтобы взял его холод могил.
Братьев восславив, топор он поднял смертоносный —
Фенрис стоит, значит многих еще доведется сразить".

"And so ended
the saga of the Baleful Howl,
May the Blackmane guide them
to Kjalhalla!
Only one was not claimed
by Morkai the dark-hearted—
Ulfar Thunderlung stood stalwart
upon the ground.
Too stubborn for death
was this rebellious wolf,
Too hot to be seized
by the chill of the grave.
His brothers praising,
he raised his deadly axe—
'Fenris stands,
so there will many yet to slay.'"
languages.original_text:
"Сага окончилась стаи Зловещего воя,
О, Черногрив, укажи до Кьялхаллы им путь!

"Сага окончилась стаи Голодных до славы,
О, Черногрив, укажи до Кьялхаллы им путь!
Лишь одного не прибрал темнодушный Моркаи -
Ульфар Громогласный упрямо на тверди стоял.

languages.text:
「こうして
破滅の咆哮の群れのサーガは終わった
ブラックメインよ彼らを
ヴァルハラへ導きたまえ！
暗き心モルカイの手から逃れたのは
ただひとりだけ…
ウルファー・サンダーラングは
大地に立っていた。
死に抗う
この反抗的な狼は
墓穴の冷たさも溶かすほど
熱い心を持っていた。
彼の兄弟は賛美し
彼は恐ろしい斧を振り上げた…
『フェンリスは生きている
この先も多くの者を殺すだろう』」
languages.original_text:
"And so ended
the saga of the Baleful Howl,
May the Blackmane guide them
to Kjalhalla!
Only one was not claimed
by Morkai the dark-hearted—
Ulfar Thunderlung stood stalwart
upon the ground.
Too stubborn for death
was this rebellious wolf,
Too hot to be seized
by the chill of the grave.
His brothers praising,
he raised his deadly axe—
'Fenris stands,
so there will many yet to slay.'"

traits.locale_text:
「こうして
破滅の咆哮の群れのサーガは終わった
ブラックメインよ彼らを
ヴァルハラへ導きたまえ！
暗き心モルカイの手から逃れたのは
ただひとりだけ…
ウルファー・サンダーラングは
大地に立っていた。
死に抗う
この反抗的な狼は
墓穴の冷たさも溶かすほど
熱い心を持っていた。
彼の兄弟は賛美し
彼は恐ろしい斧を振り上げた…
『フェンリスは生きている
この先も多くの者を殺すだろう』」

languages.text:
“怒嚎者狼群的史诗，
就在此结束，
愿黑鬃指引他们，
魂归卡尔哈拉！
当中只有一人，
未落入黑心的莫凯之手，
那就是乌尔法·雷狼，
他依旧伫立于大地之上。
这只桀骜的孤狼太过固执，
连死亡也奈何不了他。
他有一身沸腾的热血，
冰冷的墓穴也无法吞噬。
他在兄弟们的齐声赞美中，
举起危险的巨斧——
‘芬里斯屹立不倒，
还将杀戮更多的敌人。’”
languages.original_text:
"And so ended
the saga of the Baleful Howl,
May the Blackmane guide them
to Kjalhalla!
Only one was not claimed
by Morkai the dark-hearted—
Ulfar Thunderlung stood stalwart
upon the ground.
Too stubborn for death
was this rebellious wolf,
Too hot to be seized
by the chill of the grave.
His brothers praising,
he raised his deadly axe—
'Fenris stands,
so there will many yet to slay.'"

traits.locale_text:
“渴名者狼群的史诗，
就在此结束，
愿黑鬃指引他们，
魂归卡尔哈拉！
当中只有一人，
未落入黑心的莫凯之手，
那就是乌尔法·雷狼，
他依旧伫立于大地之上。
这只桀骜的孤狼太过固执，
连死亡也奈何不了他。
他有一身沸腾的热血，
冰冷的墓穴也无法吞噬。
他在兄弟们的齐声赞美中，
举起危险的巨斧——
‘芬里斯屹立不倒，
还将杀戮更多的敌人。’”

languages.text:
« Ainsi s'acheva la saga
de la meute des Hurleurs sanguinaires.
Puisse la Crinière Noire
les mener à Kjalhalla !
Un seul d'entre eux échappa
au cœur noir de Morkaï :
Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre,
invaincu et puissant.
Trop têtu pour mourir
était ce loup rebelle,
trop enflammé aussi
pour le froid de la tombe.
Louant ses frères,
il brandit sa hache en criant
"Fenris tient bon,
et bien d'autres tomberont." »
languages.original_text:
"And so ended
the saga of the Baleful Howl,
May the Blackmane guide them
to Kjalhalla!
Only one was not claimed
by Morkai the dark-hearted—
Ulfar Thunderlung stood stalwart
upon the ground.
Too stubborn for death
was this rebellious wolf,
Too hot to be seized
by the chill of the grave.
His brothers praising,
he raised his deadly axe—
'Fenris stands,
so there will many yet to slay.'"

traits.locale_text:
« Ainsi s'acheva la saga
de la meute des Dévoreurs de gloire.
Puisse la Crinière Noire
les mener à Kjalhalla !
Un seul d'entre eux échappa
au cœur noir de Morkaï :
Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre,
invaincu et puissant.
Trop têtu pour mourir
était ce loup rebelle,
trop enflammé aussi
pour le froid de la tombe.
Louant ses frères,
il brandit sa hache en criant
"Fenris tient bon,
et bien d'autres tomberont." »

languages.text:
«Y así terminó
la saga de la jauría del Aullido Torvo,
¡que Melenanegra los guíe
hasta el Kjalhalla!
Solo uno no acabó en manos
de Morkai el desalmado:
Ulfar Pulmón Atronador resistió
con firmeza su llamada.
Este lobo rebelde
era demasiado tozudo para la muerte,
demasiado ardiente para verse afectado
por el frío de la sepultura.
Alabando a sus hermanos,
alzó su letal hacha:
"Fenris aguanta,
y aún quedan muchos por matar"».
languages.original_text:
"And so ended
the saga of the Baleful Howl,
May the Blackmane guide them
to Kjalhalla!
Only one was not claimed
by Morkai the dark-hearted—
Ulfar Thunderlung stood stalwart
upon the ground.
Too stubborn for death
was this rebellious wolf,
Too hot to be seized
by the chill of the grave.
His brothers praising,
he raised his deadly axe—
'Fenris stands,
so there will many yet to slay.'"

traits.locale_text:
«Y así terminó
la saga de la manada Hambrientos de Fama,
¡que Melenanegra los guíe
hasta el Kjalhalla!
Solo uno no acabó en manos
de Morkai el desalmado:
Ulfar Pulmón Atronador resistió
con firmeza su llamada.
Este lobo rebelde
era demasiado tozudo para la muerte,
demasiado ardiente para verse afectado
por el frío de la sepultura.
Alabando a sus hermanos,
alzó su letal hacha:
"Fenris aguanta,
y aún quedan muchos por matar"».

languages.text:
"Und so endete
die Saga des Baleful-Howl-Rudels,
möge Schwarzmähne sie
nach Kjalhalla führen!
Nur einer wurde von
Morkai dem Dunkelherzigen nicht gefordert:
Ulfar Donnerlunge stand fest
auf dem Boden.
Zu stur für den Tod
war dieser rebellische Wolf,
zu heiß, um gefordert zu werden
von der Kälte des Grabs.
Seine Brüder preisend
hob seine tödliche Axt er:
'Fenris steht,
es gibt also noch viele zu töten.'"
languages.original_text:
"And so ended
the saga of the Baleful Howl,
May the Blackmane guide them
to Kjalhalla!
Only one was not claimed
by Morkai the dark-hearted—
Ulfar Thunderlung stood stalwart

His brothers praising,

so there will many yet to slay.'"

languages.text:
"Böylece son buldu,
Uğursuz Uluma'nın destanı.
Karayele, Kjalhalla'ya giden yolu
Göstersin onlara!
Teslim olmayan biri kaldı
Kara yürekli Morkai'a.
Ulfar Tufanciğer sağlam durdu
Ayaklarının üstünde.
Bu asi kurt,
Ölüme karşı pek inatçı.
Mezarın soğuğuna kanmayacak
Kadar sıcaktı.
Kardeşlerini övgüyle anarak
Ölümcül baltasını kaldırdı:
'Fenris hâlâ ayakta,
Dökülecek çok kan var.'"
languages.original_text:
"And so ended
the saga of the Baleful Howl,
May the Blackmane guide them
to Kjalhalla!
Only one was not claimed
by Morkai the dark-hearted—
Ulfar Thunderlung stood stalwart
upon the ground.
Too stubborn for death
was this rebellious wolf,
Too hot to be seized
by the chill of the grave.
His brothers praising,
he raised his deadly axe—
'Fenris stands,
so there will many yet to slay.'"

traits.locale_text:
"Böylece son buldu,
Uğursuz Uluma'nın destanı.
Karayele göstersin onlara
Kjalhalla'ya giden yolu!
Sadece biri teslim olmadı,
kara yürekli Morkai'ya.
Ulfar Tufanciğer sağlam durdu
ayaklarının üstünde.
Ölmek için fazla inatçıydı
bu asi kurt.
Mezarın soğuğuna kanmak için
fazla sıcaktı.
Kardeşlerini övgüyle anarak,
ölümcül baltasını kaldırdı:
'Fenris hâlâ ayakta,
yani dökülecek bolca kan var.'"
